author: Anthony Davis
description: Please feel free to comment,critique or suggest this idea so it can be improved.
summary: There are drugs that can lower core body temperature that may be beneficial.  Any drug that would lower core body temperature would help in theory but there are experimental versions that lower temperature by degree/equivalent dose.  http://www.biomedcentral.com/1471-2261/10/51 This is just an idea, it may be dangerous for all I know but I also know we all reach for antipyretics such as ibuprofen and paracetamol when we have a fever - so the theory is valid. This is not an overall  solution but it may help in addition to other methods.
title: Drug Induced Mild Hypothermia for PPE workers
